subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Bill Parcells’s escape clause with the Miami Dolphins was expanded before the sale of the team last month, and he can leave at any time and collect the balance of the $12 million due to him under a four-year contract. The contract Parcells signed a year ago gave him a 30-day window to depart with full pay if the team was sold.
